subject: Baseball
Collectors and Collections
lead_paragraph: When Dustin Satloff was 10, and many of his fifth-grade classmates could not spell entrepreneur, he received his first patent. Now 13, he has his own baseball bat company.
snippet: When Dustin Satloff was 10, and many of his fifth-grade classmates could not spell entrepreneur, he received his first patent. Now 13, he has his own baseball bat company.
